item.title: Pineal Gland
item.description: Pineal eye Why the eye? – Retinal tissue in the inner lining and wired to the visual cortex – vitreous fluid in it like an eye does. – the pineal gland is also thought to secrete a chemical known as DMT, which has the nickname of “The Spirit Molecule”. DMT is believed to be release during dreaming, during spiritual and mystical experiences, and during the time of death – a lot of people who have had out-of-body experiences report a silver cord linking their astral body back to their physical body located either in between the eyes or at the back of the head where the pineal gland would be.
